about_the_game:
You will play as an elf with amnesia, alone in a mysterious and dangerous foggy forest. In order to recover your lost memories, you must embark on this adventure full of unknowns. The only guide is the magic sword in your hand, but it may also lead you into the abyss. In the forest, you may face evil orcs. They are full of animality and do not covet money. Instead, they set their sights on the thin elves. You must collect magic sword fragments to gain more powerful skills or unlock paths. Defeat the powerful orcs! But if you are unfortunately captured by orcs, the consequences will be disastrous... As the adventure deepens, you will unlock more secrets about yourself and the magic sword. This fog is not only full of dangers, but also hides the mystery of the magic sword and your mysterious past.

Battle:

Defeating different powerful enemies or exploring the map will gain the lost power of the magic sword, and inject the fragments into the magic sword to gain new skills. You may encounter roadblocks in the forest that you cannot pass through, and you may need some other magic sword powers.

H animation:

During the battle, evil orcs may cast the skill of Thrasher, tear your clothes, and harass you in various ways.

At this time, you need to quickly attack left and right to break free, otherwise you will be defeated.

Dynamic CG ending:

I encountered a powerful orc in the abyss, but I couldn't defeat him despite my best efforts.

The elf was taken back to the orcs' lair, facing the same fate as countless other female adventurers.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit sexual content that is meant for adults only.

All characters depicted are 18 or older.

This game contains adult themes including: Bondage, Nonconsensual Sex.

The only guide is the magic sword in your hand, but it may also lead you into the abyss. In the forest, you may face evil orcs. They are full of animality and do not covet money. name: Misty Abyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: An elf who lost his memory, holding a broken magic sword, in the foggy forest, met strange orcs. What is the fate of the elf?
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
